reviewText: An excellent partner with the book to help as a learning aid.

I bought this and watched it prior to my Rescue Dive Class. It follows the book and provides pretty much the same information. It was good to have a visualization as to what was expected and the correct way to complete the exercises. I passed the class and it was helpful, so I give it four stars. I think it is a little pricey, but that seems to be the case with anything scuba. I definitely recommend, but it does duplicate the book. The vendor was great. Well packaged and I received it quickly. Have fun on your new adventures!

Padi - Rescue Diver DVD - 70853 I LOVE this DVD. IT was everything I thought it would be and more. It is a major bonus to help understand the books that goes along with it. To me it is a must buy if your taking the PADI Diver Resscue corse. I would also like to say that it is a MUST buy for scuba divers who don't plan on taking the course. It brings alot of knowledge and skills to a diver who might one be put in a situations similar to whats on the DVD. HIGHLY RECOMMEND buying this DVD.

As with most everything that PADI and DSAT produce, this is a straight-forward, informative video product.  It meshes well with the manual, and highlights what you need to know for chapter-end Knowledge Reviews.

PADI Rescue Diver Book & DVD are required for the Rescue Diver Course.  I recently completed the course with use of this book and the DVD.  The DVD follows the book chapter by chapter.  It complemented the book and my learning of the material very well.  I would recommend anyone taking this course to purchase both the book and the DVD.

Great service.  I ordered the product and it arrived in just a few days.  In fact, I was trying to monitor delivery but it arrived before I figured out how to access the order/ship information!  The PADI Rescue video is essential for any diver training for the Rescue Specialty.
Wish there was a little more detail - I was trying not to have to re-read the text.
Bought this for my son as a refresher and he simply loves it
Fast shipping product was exactly as advertised.
This was exactly what I needed for my rescue diver certification! It follows the book closely and is a requirement to complete the certification.
Product delivered as ordered on time. I've only had a chance to glance at it so far, but looks good.
PADI made this content in the 1980s.  They need to remake this video and put it on YouTube.  Welcome to 2015, PADI.
